sentences.sContent: We were sitting round the fire cracking nuts (= opening them ).
sentences.sCn: 我们围坐在火炉边夹碎坚果。

sentences.sContent: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
sentences.sCn: 用活动扳手将螺帽拧松。

sentences.sContent: ...The difference is that the boss of the animal hunting and the head of nut gathering probably told them to “Shut up!” or “No survival for you!” Today’s workers are still demanding control over their time...

synos.tran: 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题

phrases.pCn: [英国口语](前常与 can’t 连用)一点也，根本
澳洲坚果；夏威夷果；昆士兰果
大胆果断的人；暴躁的人
坚果破壳器，坚果脱壳机；胡桃钳
n. 可乐果（产于南美或非洲，可乐树所结的果子，含咖啡因，用于制药或饮料）

words.tran: 多坚果的；产坚果的；古怪的

trans.tranOther: a dry brown fruit inside a hard shell, that grows on a tree
